story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: When I glance over my notes and records of the Sherlock Holmes

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: cases between the years '82 and '90, I am faced by so many which

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: present strange and interesting features that it is no easy

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: matter to know which to choose and which to leave. Some, however,

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: have already gained publicity through the papers, and others have

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: not offered a field for those peculiar qualities which my friend

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: possessed in so high a degree, and which it is the object of

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: these papers to illustrate. Some, too, have baffled his

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: analytical skill, and would be, as narratives, beginnings without

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: an ending, while others have been but partially cleared up, and

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: have their explanations founded rather upon conjecture and

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: surmise than on that absolute logical proof which was so dear to

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: him. There is, however, one of these last which was so remarkable

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: in its details and so startling in its results that I am tempted

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: to give some account of it in spite of the fact that there are

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: points in connection with it which never have been, and probably

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: never will be, entirely cleared up.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: The year '87 furnished us with a long series of cases of greater

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: or less interest, of which I retain the records. Among my

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: headings under this one twelve months I find an account of the

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: adventure of the Paradol Chamber, of the Amateur Mendicant

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: Society, who held a luxurious club in the lower vault of a

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: furniture warehouse, of the facts connected with the loss of the

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: British barque "Sophy Anderson", of the singular adventures of the

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: Grice Patersons in the island of Uffa, and finally of the

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: Camberwell poisoning case. In the latter, as may be remembered,

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: Sherlock Holmes was able, by winding up the dead man's watch, to

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: prove that it had been wound up two hours before, and that

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: therefore the deceased had gone to bed within that time--a

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: deduction which was of the greatest importance in clearing up the

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: case. All these I may sketch out at some future date, but none of

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: them present such singular features as the strange train of

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: circumstances which I have now taken up my pen to describe.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: It was in the latter days of September, and the equinoctial gales

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: had set in with exceptional violence. All day the wind had

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: screamed and the rain had beaten against the windows, so that

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: even here in the heart of great, hand-made London we were forced

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: to raise our minds for the instant from the routine of life and

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: to recognise the presence of those great elemental forces which

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: shriek at mankind through the bars of his civilisation, like

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: untamed beasts in a cage. As evening drew in, the storm grew

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: higher and louder, and the wind cried and sobbed like a child in

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: the chimney. Sherlock Holmes sat moodily at one side of the

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: fireplace cross-indexing his records of crime, while I at the

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: other was deep in one of Clark Russell's fine sea-stories until

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: the howl of the gale from without seemed to blend with the text,

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: and the splash of the rain to lengthen out into the long swash of

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: the sea waves. My wife was on a visit to her mother's, and for a

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: few days I was a dweller once more in my old quarters at Baker

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: Street.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "Why," said I, glancing up at my companion, "that was surely the

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: bell. Who could come to-night? Some friend of yours, perhaps?"

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "Except yourself I have none," he answered. "I do not encourage

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: visitors."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "A client, then?"

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "If so, it is a serious case. Nothing less would bring a man out

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: on such a day and at such an hour. But I take it that it is more

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: likely to be some crony of the landlady's."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: Sherlock Holmes was wrong in his conjecture, however, for there

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: came a step in the passage and a tapping at the door. He

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: stretched out his long arm to turn the lamp away from himself and

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: towards the vacant chair upon which a newcomer must sit.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "Come in!" said he.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: The man who entered was young, some two-and-twenty at the

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: outside, well-groomed and trimly clad, with something of

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: refinement and delicacy in his bearing. The streaming umbrella

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: which he held in his hand, and his long shining waterproof told

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: of the fierce weather through which he had come. He looked about

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: him anxiously in the glare of the lamp, and I could see that his

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: face was pale and his eyes heavy, like those of a man who is

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: weighed down with some great anxiety.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "I owe you an apology," he said, raising his golden pince-nez to

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: his eyes. "I trust that I am not intruding. I fear that I have

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: brought some traces of the storm and rain into your snug

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: chamber."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "Give me your coat and umbrella," said Holmes. "They may rest

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: here on the hook and will be dry presently. You have come up from

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: the south-west, I see."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "Yes, from Horsham."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "That clay and chalk mixture which I see upon your toe caps is

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: quite distinctive."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "I have come for advice."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "That is easily got."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "And help."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "That is not always so easy."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "I have heard of you, Mr. Holmes. I heard from Major Prendergast

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: how you saved him in the Tankerville Club scandal."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "Ah, of course. He was wrongfully accused of cheating at cards."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "He said that you could solve anything."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "He said too much."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "That you are never beaten."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "I have been beaten four times--three times by men, and once by a

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: woman."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "But what is that compared with the number of your successes?"

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "It is true that I have been generally successful."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "Then you may be so with me."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "I beg that you will draw your chair up to the fire and favour me

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: with some details as to your case."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "It is no ordinary one."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "None of those which come to me are. I am the last court of

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: appeal."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "And yet I question, sir, whether, in all your experience, you

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: have ever listened to a more mysterious and inexplicable chain of

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: events than those which have happened in my own family."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "You fill me with interest," said Holmes. "Pray give us the

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: essential facts from the commencement, and I can afterwards

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: question you as to those details which seem to me to be most

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: important."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: The young man pulled his chair up and pushed his wet feet out

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: towards the blaze.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "My name," said he, "is John Openshaw, but my own affairs have,

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: as far as I can understand, little to do with this awful

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: business. It is a hereditary matter; so in order to give you an

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: idea of the facts, I must go back to the commencement of the

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: affair.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "You must know that my grandfather had two sons--my uncle Elias

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: and my father Joseph. My father had a small factory at Coventry,

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: which he enlarged at the time of the invention of bicycling. He

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: was a patentee of the Openshaw unbreakable tire, and his business

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: met with such success that he was able to sell it and to retire

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: upon a handsome competence.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "My uncle Elias emigrated to America when he was a young man and

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: became a planter in Florida, where he was reported to have done

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: very well. At the time of the war he fought in Jackson's army,

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: and afterwards under Hood, where he rose to be a colonel. When

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: Lee laid down his arms my uncle returned to his plantation, where

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: he remained for three or four years. About 1869 or 1870 he came

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: back to Europe and took a small estate in Sussex, near Horsham.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: He had made a very considerable fortune in the States, and his

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: reason for leaving them was his aversion to the negroes, and his

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: dislike of the Republican policy in extending the franchise to

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: them. He was a singular man, fierce and quick-tempered, very

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: foul-mouthed when he was angry, and of a most retiring

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: disposition. During all the years that he lived at Horsham, I

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: doubt if ever he set foot in the town. He had a garden and two or

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: three fields round his house, and there he would take his

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: exercise, though very often for weeks on end he would never leave

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: his room. He drank a great deal of brandy and smoked very

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: heavily, but he would see no society and did not want any

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: friends, not even his own brother.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "He didn't mind me; in fact, he took a fancy to me, for at the

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: time when he saw me first I was a youngster of twelve or so. This

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: would be in the year 1878, after he had been eight or nine years

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: in England. He begged my father to let me live with him and he

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: was very kind to me in his way. When he was sober he used to be

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: fond of playing backgammon and draughts with me, and he would

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: make me his representative both with the servants and with the

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: tradespeople, so that by the time that I was sixteen I was quite

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: master of the house. I kept all the keys and could go where I

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: liked and do what I liked, so long as I did not disturb him in

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: his privacy. There was one singular exception, however, for he

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: had a single room, a lumber-room up among the attics, which was

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: invariably locked, and which he would never permit either me or

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: anyone else to enter. With a boy's curiosity I have peeped

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: through the keyhole, but I was never able to see more than such a

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: collection of old trunks and bundles as would be expected in such

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: a room.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "One day--it was in March, 1883--a letter with a foreign stamp

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: lay upon the table in front of the colonel's plate. It was not a

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: common thing for him to receive letters, for his bills were all

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: paid in ready money, and he had no friends of any sort. 'From

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: India!' said he as he took it up, 'Pondicherry postmark! What can

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: this be?' Opening it hurriedly, out there jumped five little

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: dried orange pips, which pattered down upon his plate. I began to

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: laugh at this, but the laugh was struck from my lips at the sight

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: of his face. His lip had fallen, his eyes were protruding, his

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: skin the colour of putty, and he glared at the envelope which he

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: still held in his trembling hand, 'K. K. K.!' he shrieked, and

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: then, 'My God, my God, my sins have overtaken me!'

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "'What is it, uncle?' I cried.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "'Death,' said he, and rising from the table he retired to his

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: room, leaving me palpitating with horror. I took up the envelope

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: and saw scrawled in red ink upon the inner flap, just above the

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: gum, the letter K three times repeated. There was nothing else

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: save the five dried pips. What could be the reason of his

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: overpowering terror? I left the breakfast-table, and as I

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: ascended the stair I met him coming down with an old rusty key,

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: which must have belonged to the attic, in one hand, and a small

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: brass box, like a cashbox, in the other.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "'They may do what they like, but I'll checkmate them still,'

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: said he with an oath. 'Tell Mary that I shall want a fire in my

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: room to-day, and send down to Fordham, the Horsham lawyer.'

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "I did as he ordered, and when the lawyer arrived I was asked to

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: step up to the room. The fire was burning brightly, and in the

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: grate there was a mass of black, fluffy ashes, as of burned

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: paper, while the brass box stood open and empty beside it. As I

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: glanced at the box I noticed, with a start, that upon the lid was

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: printed the treble K which I had read in the morning upon the

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: envelope.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "'I wish you, John,' said my uncle, 'to witness my will. I leave

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: my estate, with all its advantages and all its disadvantages, to

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: my brother, your father, whence it will, no doubt, descend to

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: you. If you can enjoy it in peace, well and good! If you find you

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: cannot, take my advice, my boy, and leave it to your deadliest

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: enemy. I am sorry to give you such a two-edged thing, but I can't

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: say what turn things are going to take. Kindly sign the paper

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: where Mr. Fordham shows you.'

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "I signed the paper as directed, and the lawyer took it away with

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: him. The singular incident made, as you may think, the deepest

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: impression upon me, and I pondered over it and turned it every

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: way in my mind without being able to make anything of it. Yet I

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: could not shake off the vague feeling of dread which it left

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: behind, though the sensation grew less keen as the weeks passed

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: and nothing happened to disturb the usual routine of our lives. I

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: could see a change in my uncle, however. He drank more than ever,

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: and he was less inclined for any sort of society. Most of his

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: time he would spend in his room, with the door locked upon the

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: inside, but sometimes he would emerge in a sort of drunken frenzy

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: and would burst out of the house and tear about the garden with a

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: revolver in his hand, screaming out that he was afraid of no man,

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: and that he was not to be cooped up, like a sheep in a pen, by

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: man or devil. When these hot fits were over, however, he would

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: rush tumultuously in at the door and lock and bar it behind him,

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: like a man who can brazen it out no longer against the terror

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: which lies at the roots of his soul. At such times I have seen

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: his face, even on a cold day, glisten with moisture, as though it

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: were new raised from a basin.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "Well, to come to an end of the matter, Mr. Holmes, and not to

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: abuse your patience, there came a night when he made one of those

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: drunken sallies from which he never came back. We found him, when

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: we went to search for him, face downward in a little

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: green-scummed pool, which lay at the foot of the garden. There

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: was no sign of any violence, and the water was but two feet deep,

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: so that the jury, having regard to his known eccentricity,

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: brought in a verdict of 'suicide.' But I, who knew how he winced

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: from the very thought of death, had much ado to persuade myself

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: that he had gone out of his way to meet it. The matter passed,

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: however, and my father entered into possession of the estate, and

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: of some 14,000 pounds, which lay to his credit at the bank."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "One moment," Holmes interposed, "your statement is, I foresee,

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: one of the most remarkable to which I have ever listened. Let me

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: have the date of the reception by your uncle of the letter, and

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: the date of his supposed suicide."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "The letter arrived on March 10, 1883. His death was seven weeks

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: later, upon the night of May 2nd."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "Thank you. Pray proceed."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "When my father took over the Horsham property, he, at my

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: request, made a careful examination of the attic, which had been

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: always locked up. We found the brass box there, although its

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: contents had been destroyed. On the inside of the cover was a

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: paper label, with the initials of K. K. K. repeated upon it, and

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: 'Letters, memoranda, receipts, and a register' written beneath.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: These, we presume, indicated the nature of the papers which had

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: been destroyed by Colonel Openshaw. For the rest, there was

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: nothing of much importance in the attic save a great many

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: scattered papers and note-books bearing upon my uncle's life in

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: America. Some of them were of the war time and showed that he had

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: done his duty well and had borne the repute of a brave soldier.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: Others were of a date during the reconstruction of the Southern

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: states, and were mostly concerned with politics, for he had

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: evidently taken a strong part in opposing the carpet-bag

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: politicians who had been sent down from the North.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "Well, it was the beginning of '84 when my father came to live at

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: Horsham, and all went as well as possible with us until the

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: January of '85. On the fourth day after the new year I heard my

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: father give a sharp cry of surprise as we sat together at the

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: breakfast-table. There he was, sitting with a newly opened

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: envelope in one hand and five dried orange pips in the

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: outstretched palm of the other one. He had always laughed at what

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: he called my cock-and-bull story about the colonel, but he looked

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: very scared and puzzled now that the same thing had come upon

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: himself.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "'Why, what on earth does this mean, John?' he stammered.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "My heart had turned to lead. 'It is K. K. K.,' said I.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "He looked inside the envelope. 'So it is,' he cried. 'Here are

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: the very letters. But what is this written above them?'

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "'Put the papers on the sundial,' I read, peeping over his

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: shoulder.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "'What papers? What sundial?' he asked.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "'The sundial in the garden. There is no other,' said I; 'but the

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: papers must be those that are destroyed.'

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "'Pooh!' said he, gripping hard at his courage. 'We are in a

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: civilised land here, and we can't have tomfoolery of this kind.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: Where does the thing come from?'

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "'From Dundee,' I answered, glancing at the postmark.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "'Some preposterous practical joke,' said he. 'What have I to do

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: with sundials and papers? I shall take no notice of such

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: nonsense.'

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "'I should certainly speak to the police,' I said.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "'And be laughed at for my pains. Nothing of the sort.'

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "'Then let me do so?'

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "'No, I forbid you. I won't have a fuss made about such

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: nonsense.'

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "It was in vain to argue with him, for he was a very obstinate

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: man. I went about, however, with a heart which was full of

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: forebodings.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "On the third day after the coming of the letter my father went

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: from home to visit an old friend of his, Major Freebody, who is

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: in command of one of the forts upon Portsdown Hill. I was glad

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: that he should go, for it seemed to me that he was farther from

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: danger when he was away from home. In that, however, I was in

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: error. Upon the second day of his absence I received a telegram

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: from the major, imploring me to come at once. My father had

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: fallen over one of the deep chalk-pits which abound in the

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: neighbourhood, and was lying senseless, with a shattered skull. I

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: hurried to him, but he passed away without having ever recovered

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: his consciousness. He had, as it appears, been returning from

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: Fareham in the twilight, and as the country was unknown to him,

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: and the chalk-pit unfenced, the jury had no hesitation in

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: bringing in a verdict of 'death from accidental causes.'

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: Carefully as I examined every fact connected with his death, I

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: was unable to find anything which could suggest the idea of

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: murder. There were no signs of violence, no footmarks, no

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: robbery, no record of strangers having been seen upon the roads.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: And yet I need not tell you that my mind was far from at ease,

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: and that I was well-nigh certain that some foul plot had been

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: woven round him.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "In this sinister way I came into my inheritance. You will ask me

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: why I did not dispose of it? I answer, because I was well

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: convinced that our troubles were in some way dependent upon an

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: incident in my uncle's life, and that the danger would be as

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: pressing in one house as in another.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "It was in January, '85, that my poor father met his end, and two

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: years and eight months have elapsed since then. During that time

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: I have lived happily at Horsham, and I had begun to hope that

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: this curse had passed away from the family, and that it had ended

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: with the last generation. I had begun to take comfort too soon,

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: however; yesterday morning the blow fell in the very shape in

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: which it had come upon my father."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: The young man took from his waistcoat a crumpled envelope, and

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: turning to the table he shook out upon it five little dried

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: orange pips.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "This is the envelope," he continued. "The postmark is

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: London--eastern division. Within are the very words which were

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: upon my father's last message: 'K. K. K.'; and then 'Put the

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: papers on the sundial.'"

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "What have you done?" asked Holmes.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "Nothing."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "Nothing?"

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "To tell the truth"--he sank his face into his thin, white

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: hands--"I have felt helpless. I have felt like one of those poor

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: rabbits when the snake is writhing towards it. I seem to be in

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: the grasp of some resistless, inexorable evil, which no foresight

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: and no precautions can guard against."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "Tut! tut!" cried Sherlock Holmes. "You must act, man, or you are

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: lost. Nothing but energy can save you. This is no time for

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: despair."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "I have seen the police."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "Ah!"

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "But they listened to my story with a smile. I am convinced that

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: the inspector has formed the opinion that the letters are all

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: practical jokes, and that the deaths of my relations were really

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: accidents, as the jury stated, and were not to be connected with

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: the warnings."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: Holmes shook his clenched hands in the air. "Incredible

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: imbecility!" he cried.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "They have, however, allowed me a policeman, who may remain in

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: the house with me."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "Why did you come to me," he cried, "and, above all, why did you

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "I did not know. It was only to-day that I spoke to Major

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: Prendergast about my troubles and was advised by him to come to

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: you."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "It is really two days since you had the letter. We should have

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: acted before this. You have no further evidence, I suppose, than

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: that which you have placed before us--no suggestive detail which

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: might help us?"

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "There is one thing," said John Openshaw. He rummaged in his coat

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: pocket, and, drawing out a piece of discoloured, blue-tinted

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: paper, he laid it out upon the table. "I have some remembrance,"

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: said he, "that on the day when my uncle burned the papers I

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: observed that the small, unburned margins which lay amid the

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: ashes were of this particular colour. I found this single sheet

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: upon the floor of his room, and I am inclined to think that it

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: may be one of the papers which has, perhaps, fluttered out from

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: among the others, and in that way has escaped destruction. Beyond

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: the mention of pips, I do not see that it helps us much. I think

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: myself that it is a page from some private diary. The writing is

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: undoubtedly my uncle's."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: which showed by its ragged edge that it had indeed been torn from

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: a book. It was headed, "March, 1869," and beneath were the

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: following enigmatical notices:

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

text: "4th. Hudson came. Same old platform.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

text: "12th. Visited Paramore. All well."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "Thank you!" said Holmes, folding up the paper and returning it

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: to our visitor. "And now you must on no account lose another

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: instant. We cannot spare time even to discuss what you have told

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: me. You must get home instantly and act."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "What shall I do?"

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "There is but one thing to do. It must be done at once. You must

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: put this piece of paper which you have shown us into the brass

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: box which you have described. You must also put in a note to say

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: that all the other papers were burned by your uncle, and that

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: this is the only one which remains. You must assert that in such

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: words as will carry conviction with them. Having done this, you

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: must at once put the box out upon the sundial, as directed. Do

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: you understand?"

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "Entirely."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "Do not think of revenge, or anything of the sort, at present. I

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: think that we may gain that by means of the law; but we have our

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: web to weave, while theirs is already woven. The first

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: consideration is to remove the pressing danger which threatens

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: you. The second is to clear up the mystery and to punish the

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: guilty parties."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "I thank you," said the young man, rising and pulling on his

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: overcoat. "You have given me fresh life and hope. I shall

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: certainly do as you advise."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "Do not lose an instant. And, above all, take care of yourself in

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: the meanwhile, for I do not think that there can be a doubt that

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: you are threatened by a very real and imminent danger. How do you

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: go back?"

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "By train from Waterloo."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "It is not yet nine. The streets will be crowded, so I trust that

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: you may be in safety. And yet you cannot guard yourself too

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: closely."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "I am armed."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "That is well. To-morrow I shall set to work upon your case."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "I shall see you at Horsham, then?"

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "No, your secret lies in London. It is there that I shall seek

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: it."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "Then I shall call upon you in a day, or in two days, with news

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: as to the box and the papers. I shall take your advice in every

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: particular." He shook hands with us and took his leave. Outside

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: the wind still screamed and the rain splashed and pattered

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: against the windows. This strange, wild story seemed to have come

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: to us from amid the mad elements--blown in upon us like a sheet

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: of sea-weed in a gale--and now to have been reabsorbed by them

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: once more.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: Sherlock Holmes sat for some time in silence, with his head sunk

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: forward and his eyes bent upon the red glow of the fire. Then he

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: lit his pipe, and leaning back in his chair he watched the blue

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: smoke-rings as they chased each other up to the ceiling.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "I think, Watson," he remarked at last, "that of all our cases we

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: have had none more fantastic than this."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "Save, perhaps, the Sign of Four."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "Well, yes. Save, perhaps, that. And yet this John Openshaw seems

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: to me to be walking amid even greater perils than did the

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: Sholtos."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "But have you," I asked, "formed any definite conception as to

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: what these perils are?"

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "There can be no question as to their nature," he answered.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "Then what are they? Who is this K. K. K., and why does he pursue

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: this unhappy family?"

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: Sherlock Holmes closed his eyes and placed his elbows upon the

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: arms of his chair, with his finger-tips together. "The ideal

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: reasoner," he remarked, "would, when he had once been shown a

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: single fact in all its bearings, deduce from it not only all the

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: chain of events which led up to it but also all the results which

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: would follow from it. As Cuvier could correctly describe a whole

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: animal by the contemplation of a single bone, so the observer who

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: has thoroughly understood one link in a series of incidents

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: should be able to accurately state all the other ones, both

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: before and after. We have not yet grasped the results which the

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: reason alone can attain to. Problems may be solved in the study

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: which have baffled all those who have sought a solution by the

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: aid of their senses. To carry the art, however, to its highest

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: pitch, it is necessary that the reasoner should be able to

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: utilise all the facts which have come to his knowledge; and this

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: in itself implies, as you will readily see, a possession of all

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: knowledge, which, even in these days of free education and

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: encyclopaedias, is a somewhat rare accomplishment. It is not so

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: impossible, however, that a man should possess all knowledge

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: which is likely to be useful to him in his work, and this I have

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: endeavoured in my case to do. If I remember rightly, you on one

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: occasion, in the early days of our friendship, defined my limits

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: in a very precise fashion."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "Yes," I answered, laughing. "It was a singular document.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: Philosophy, astronomy, and politics were marked at zero, I

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: remember. Botany variable, geology profound as regards the

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: mud-stains from any region within fifty miles of town, chemistry

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: eccentric, anatomy unsystematic, sensational literature and crime

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: records unique, violin-player, boxer, swordsman, lawyer, and

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: self-poisoner by cocaine and tobacco. Those, I think, were the

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: main points of my analysis."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: Holmes grinned at the last item. "Well," he said, "I say now, as

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: I said then, that a man should keep his little brain-attic

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: stocked with all the furniture that he is likely to use, and the

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: rest he can put away in the lumber-room of his library, where he

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: can get it if he wants it. Now, for such a case as the one which

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: has been submitted to us to-night, we need certainly to muster

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: all our resources. Kindly hand me down the letter K of the

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: 'American Encyclopaedia' which stands upon the shelf beside you.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: Thank you. Now let us consider the situation and see what may be

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: deduced from it. In the first place, we may start with a strong

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: presumption that Colonel Openshaw had some very strong reason for

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: leaving America. Men at his time of life do not change all their

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: habits and exchange willingly the charming climate of Florida for

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: the lonely life of an English provincial town. His extreme love

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: of solitude in England suggests the idea that he was in fear of

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: someone or something, so we may assume as a working hypothesis

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: that it was fear of someone or something which drove him from

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: America. As to what it was he feared, we can only deduce that by

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: considering the formidable letters which were received by himself

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: and his successors. Did you remark the postmarks of those

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: letters?"

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "The first was from Pondicherry, the second from Dundee, and the

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: third from London."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "From East London. What do you deduce from that?"

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "They are all seaports. That the writer was on board of a ship."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "Excellent. We have already a clue. There can be no doubt that

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: the probability--the strong probability--is that the writer was

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: on board of a ship. And now let us consider another point. In the

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: case of Pondicherry, seven weeks elapsed between the threat and

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: its fulfilment, in Dundee it was only some three or four days.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: Does that suggest anything?"

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "A greater distance to travel."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "But the letter had also a greater distance to come."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "Then I do not see the point."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "There is at least a presumption that the vessel in which the man

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: or men are is a sailing-ship. It looks as if they always send

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: their singular warning or token before them when starting upon

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: their mission. You see how quickly the deed followed the sign

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: when it came from Dundee. If they had come from Pondicherry in a

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: steamer they would have arrived almost as soon as their letter.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: But, as a matter of fact, seven weeks elapsed. I think that those

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: seven weeks represented the difference between the mail-boat which

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: brought the letter and the sailing vessel which brought the

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: writer."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "It is possible."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "More than that. It is probable. And now you see the deadly

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: urgency of this new case, and why I urged young Openshaw to

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: caution. The blow has always fallen at the end of the time which

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: it would take the senders to travel the distance. But this one

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: comes from London, and therefore we cannot count upon delay."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "Good God!" I cried. "What can it mean, this relentless

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: persecution?"

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "The papers which Openshaw carried are obviously of vital

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: importance to the person or persons in the sailing-ship. I think

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: that it is quite clear that there must be more than one of them.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: A single man could not have carried out two deaths in such a way

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: as to deceive a coroner's jury. There must have been several in

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: it, and they must have been men of resource and determination.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: Their papers they mean to have, be the holder of them who it may.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: In this way you see K. K. K. ceases to be the initials of an

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: individual and becomes the badge of a society."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "But of what society?"

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "Have you never--" said Sherlock Holmes, bending forward and

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: sinking his voice--"have you never heard of the Ku Klux Klan?"

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "I never have."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
