story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: Holmes turned over the leaves of the book upon his knee. "Here it

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: is," said he presently:

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "'Ku Klux Klan. A name derived from the fanciful resemblance to

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: the sound produced by cocking a rifle. This terrible secret

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: society was formed by some ex-Confederate soldiers in the

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: Southern states after the Civil War, and it rapidly formed local

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: branches in different parts of the country, notably in Tennessee,

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: Louisiana, the Carolinas, Georgia, and Florida. Its power was

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: used for political purposes, principally for the terrorising of

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: the negro voters and the murdering and driving from the country

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: of those who were opposed to its views. Its outrages were usually

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: preceded by a warning sent to the marked man in some fantastic

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: but generally recognised shape--a sprig of oak-leaves in some

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: parts, melon seeds or orange pips in others. On receiving this

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: the victim might either openly abjure his former ways, or might

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: fly from the country. If he braved the matter out, death would

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: unfailingly come upon him, and usually in some strange and

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: unforeseen manner. So perfect was the organisation of the

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: society, and so systematic its methods, that there is hardly a

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: case upon record where any man succeeded in braving it with

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: impunity, or in which any of its outrages were traced home to the

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: perpetrators. For some years the organisation flourished in spite

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: of the efforts of the United States government and of the better

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: classes of the community in the South. Eventually, in the year

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: 1869, the movement rather suddenly collapsed, although there have

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: been sporadic outbreaks of the same sort since that date.'

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "You will observe," said Holmes, laying down the volume, "that

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: the sudden breaking up of the society was coincident with the

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: disappearance of Openshaw from America with their papers. It may

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: well have been cause and effect. It is no wonder that he and his

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: family have some of the more implacable spirits upon their track.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: You can understand that this register and diary may implicate

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: some of the first men in the South, and that there may be many

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: who will not sleep easy at night until it is recovered."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "Then the page we have seen--"

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "Is such as we might expect. It ran, if I remember right, 'sent

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: the pips to A, B, and C'--that is, sent the society's warning to

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: them. Then there are successive entries that A and B cleared, or

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: left the country, and finally that C was visited, with, I fear, a

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: sinister result for C. Well, I think, Doctor, that we may let

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: some light into this dark place, and I believe that the only

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: chance young Openshaw has in the meantime is to do what I have

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: told him. There is nothing more to be said or to be done

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: to-night, so hand me over my violin and let us try to forget for

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: half an hour the miserable weather and the still more miserable

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: ways of our fellow-men."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: It had cleared in the morning, and the sun was shining with a

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: subdued brightness through the dim veil which hangs over the

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: great city. Sherlock Holmes was already at breakfast when I came

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: down.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "You will excuse me for not waiting for you," said he; "I have, I

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: foresee, a very busy day before me in looking into this case of

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: young Openshaw's."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "What steps will you take?" I asked.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "It will very much depend upon the results of my first inquiries.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: I may have to go down to Horsham, after all."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "You will not go there first?"

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "No, I shall commence with the City. Just ring the bell and the

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: maid will bring up your coffee."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: As I waited, I lifted the unopened newspaper from the table and

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: glanced my eye over it. It rested upon a heading which sent a

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: chill to my heart.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "Holmes," I cried, "you are too late."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "Ah!" said he, laying down his cup, "I feared as much. How was it

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: done?" He spoke calmly, but I could see that he was deeply moved.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "My eye caught the name of Openshaw, and the heading 'Tragedy

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: Near Waterloo Bridge.' Here is the account:

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "Between nine and ten last night Police-Constable Cook, of the H

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: Division, on duty near Waterloo Bridge, heard a cry for help and

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: a splash in the water. The night, however, was extremely dark and

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: stormy, so that, in spite of the help of several passers-by, it

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: was quite impossible to effect a rescue. The alarm, however, was

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: given, and, by the aid of the water-police, the body was

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: eventually recovered. It proved to be that of a young gentleman

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: whose name, as it appears from an envelope which was found in his

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: pocket, was John Openshaw, and whose residence is near Horsham.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: It is conjectured that he may have been hurrying down to catch

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: the last train from Waterloo Station, and that in his haste and

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: the extreme darkness he missed his path and walked over the edge

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: of one of the small landing-places for river steamboats. The body

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: exhibited no traces of violence, and there can be no doubt that

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: the deceased had been the victim of an unfortunate accident,

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: which should have the effect of calling the attention of the

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: authorities to the condition of the riverside landing-stages."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: We sat in silence for some minutes, Holmes more depressed and

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: shaken than I had ever seen him.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "That hurts my pride, Watson," he said at last. "It is a petty

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: feeling, no doubt, but it hurts my pride. It becomes a personal

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: matter with me now, and, if God sends me health, I shall set my

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: hand upon this gang. That he should come to me for help, and that

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: I should send him away to his death--!" He sprang from his chair

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: and paced about the room in uncontrollable agitation, with a

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: flush upon his sallow cheeks and a nervous clasping and

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: unclasping of his long thin hands.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "They must be cunning devils," he exclaimed at last. "How could

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: they have decoyed him down there? The Embankment is not on the

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: direct line to the station. The bridge, no doubt, was too

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: crowded, even on such a night, for their purpose. Well, Watson,

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: we shall see who will win in the long run. I am going out now!"

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "To the police?"

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "No; I shall be my own police. When I have spun the web they may

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: take the flies, but not before."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: All day I was engaged in my professional work, and it was late in

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: the evening before I returned to Baker Street. Sherlock Holmes

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: had not come back yet. It was nearly ten o'clock before he

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: entered, looking pale and worn. He walked up to the sideboard,

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: and tearing a piece from the loaf he devoured it voraciously,

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: washing it down with a long draught of water.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "You are hungry," I remarked.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "Starving. It had escaped my memory. I have had nothing since

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: breakfast."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "Nothing?"

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "Not a bite. I had no time to think of it."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "And how have you succeeded?"

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "Well."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "You have a clue?"

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "I have them in the hollow of my hand. Young Openshaw shall not

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: long remain unavenged. Why, Watson, let us put their own devilish

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: trade-mark upon them. It is well thought of!"

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "What do you mean?"

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: He took an orange from the cupboard, and tearing it to pieces he

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: squeezed out the pips upon the table. Of these he took five and

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: thrust them into an envelope. On the inside of the flap he wrote

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "S. H. for J. O." Then he sealed it and addressed it to "Captain

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: James Calhoun, Barque 'Lone Star,' Savannah, Georgia."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "That will await him when he enters port," said he, chuckling.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "It may give him a sleepless night. He will find it as sure a

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: precursor of his fate as Openshaw did before him."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "And who is this Captain Calhoun?"

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "The leader of the gang. I shall have the others, but he first."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "How did you trace it, then?"

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: He took a large sheet of paper from his pocket, all covered with

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: dates and names.

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "I have spent the whole day," said he, "over Lloyd's registers

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: and files of the old papers, following the future career of every

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: vessel which touched at Pondicherry in January and February in

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: '83. There were thirty-six ships of fair tonnage which were

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: reported there during those months. Of these, one, the 'Lone Star,'

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: instantly attracted my attention, since, although it was reported

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: as having cleared from London, the name is that which is given to

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: one of the states of the Union."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "Texas, I think."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "I was not and am not sure which; but I knew that the ship must

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: have an American origin."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "What then?"

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "I searched the Dundee records, and when I found that the barque

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: 'Lone Star' was there in January, '85, my suspicion became a

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: certainty. I then inquired as to the vessels which lay at present

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: in the port of London."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "Yes?"

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "The 'Lone Star' had arrived here last week. I went down to the

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: Albert Dock and found that she had been taken down the river by

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: the early tide this morning, homeward bound to Savannah. I wired

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: to Gravesend and learned that she had passed some time ago, and

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: as the wind is easterly I have no doubt that she is now past the

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: Goodwins and not very far from the Isle of Wight."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "What will you do, then?"

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: "Oh, I have my hand upon him. He and the two mates, are as I

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: learn, the only native-born Americans in the ship. The others are

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: Finns and Germans. I know, also, that they were all three away

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: from the ship last night. I had it from the stevedore who has

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: been loading their cargo. By the time that their sailing-ship

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: reaches Savannah the mail-boat will have carried this letter, and

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: the cable will have informed the police of Savannah that these

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: three gentlemen are badly wanted here upon a charge of murder."

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: There is ever a flaw, however, in the best laid of human plans,

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: and the murderers of John Openshaw were never to receive the

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: orange pips which would show them that another, as cunning and as

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: resolute as themselves, was upon their track. Very long and very

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: severe were the equinoctial gales that year. We waited long for

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: news of the "Lone Star" of Savannah, but none ever reached us. We

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: did at last hear that somewhere far out in the Atlantic a

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: shattered stern-post of a boat was seen swinging in the trough

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: of a wave, with the letters "L. S." carved upon it, and that is

story: ADVENTURE V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS
text: all which we shall ever know of the fate of the "Lone Star."

text: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: Isa Whitney, brother of the late Elias Whitney, D.D., Principal

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: of the Theological College of St. George's, was much addicted to

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: opium. The habit grew upon him, as I understand, from some

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: foolish freak when he was at college; for having read De

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: Quincey's description of his dreams and sensations, he had

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: drenched his tobacco with laudanum in an attempt to produce the

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: same effects. He found, as so many more have done, that the

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: practice is easier to attain than to get rid of, and for many

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: years he continued to be a slave to the drug, an object of

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: mingled horror and pity to his friends and relatives. I can see

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: him now, with yellow, pasty face, drooping lids, and pin-point

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: pupils, all huddled in a chair, the wreck and ruin of a noble

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: man.

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: One night--it was in June, '89--there came a ring to my bell,

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: about the hour when a man gives his first yawn and glances at the

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: clock. I sat up in my chair, and my wife laid her needle-work

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: down in her lap and made a little face of disappointment.

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: "A patient!" said she. "You'll have to go out."

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: I groaned, for I was newly come back from a weary day.

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: We heard the door open, a few hurried words, and then quick steps

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: upon the linoleum. Our own door flew open, and a lady, clad in

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: some dark-coloured stuff, with a black veil, entered the room.

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: "You will excuse my calling so late," she began, and then,

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: suddenly losing her self-control, she ran forward, threw her arms

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: about my wife's neck, and sobbed upon her shoulder. "Oh, I'm in

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: such trouble!" she cried; "I do so want a little help."

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: "Why," said my wife, pulling up her veil, "it is Kate Whitney.

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: How you startled me, Kate! I had not an idea who you were when

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: you came in."

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: "I didn't know what to do, so I came straight to you." That was

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: always the way. Folk who were in grief came to my wife like birds

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: to a light-house.

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: "It was very sweet of you to come. Now, you must have some wine

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: and water, and sit here comfortably and tell us all about it. Or

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: should you rather that I sent James off to bed?"

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: "Oh, no, no! I want the doctor's advice and help, too. It's about

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: Isa. He has not been home for two days. I am so frightened about

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: him!"

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: It was not the first time that she had spoken to us of her

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: husband's trouble, to me as a doctor, to my wife as an old friend

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: and school companion. We soothed and comforted her by such words

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: as we could find. Did she know where her husband was? Was it

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: possible that we could bring him back to her?

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: It seems that it was. She had the surest information that of late

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: he had, when the fit was on him, made use of an opium den in the

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: farthest east of the City. Hitherto his orgies had always been

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: confined to one day, and he had come back, twitching and

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: shattered, in the evening. But now the spell had been upon him

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: eight-and-forty hours, and he lay there, doubtless among the

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: dregs of the docks, breathing in the poison or sleeping off the

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: effects. There he was to be found, she was sure of it, at the Bar

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: of Gold, in Upper Swandam Lane. But what was she to do? How could

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: she, a young and timid woman, make her way into such a place and

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: pluck her husband out from among the ruffians who surrounded him?

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: There was the case, and of course there was but one way out of

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: it. Might I not escort her to this place? And then, as a second

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: thought, why should she come at all? I was Isa Whitney's medical

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: adviser, and as such I had influence over him. I could manage it

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: better if I were alone. I promised her on my word that I would

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: send him home in a cab within two hours if he were indeed at the

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: address which she had given me. And so in ten minutes I had left

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: my armchair and cheery sitting-room behind me, and was speeding

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: eastward in a hansom on a strange errand, as it seemed to me at

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: the time, though the future only could show how strange it was to

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: be.

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: But there was no great difficulty in the first stage of my

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: adventure. Upper Swandam Lane is a vile alley lurking behind the

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: high wharves which line the north side of the river to the east

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: of London Bridge. Between a slop-shop and a gin-shop, approached

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: by a steep flight of steps leading down to a black gap like the

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: mouth of a cave, I found the den of which I was in search.

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: Ordering my cab to wait, I passed down the steps, worn hollow in

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: the centre by the ceaseless tread of drunken feet; and by the

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: light of a flickering oil-lamp above the door I found the latch

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: and made my way into a long, low room, thick and heavy with the

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: brown opium smoke, and terraced with wooden berths, like the

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: forecastle of an emigrant ship.

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: Through the gloom one could dimly catch a glimpse of bodies lying

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: in strange fantastic poses, bowed shoulders, bent knees, heads

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: thrown back, and chins pointing upward, with here and there a

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: dark, lack-lustre eye turned upon the newcomer. Out of the black

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: shadows there glimmered little red circles of light, now bright,

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: now faint, as the burning poison waxed or waned in the bowls of

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: the metal pipes. The most lay silent, but some muttered to

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: themselves, and others talked together in a strange, low,

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: monotonous voice, their conversation coming in gushes, and then

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: suddenly tailing off into silence, each mumbling out his own

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: thoughts and paying little heed to the words of his neighbour. At

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: the farther end was a small brazier of burning charcoal, beside

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: which on a three-legged wooden stool there sat a tall, thin old

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: man, with his jaw resting upon his two fists, and his elbows upon

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: his knees, staring into the fire.

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: As I entered, a sallow Malay attendant had hurried up with a pipe

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: for me and a supply of the drug, beckoning me to an empty berth.

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: "Thank you. I have not come to stay," said I. "There is a friend

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: of mine here, Mr. Isa Whitney, and I wish to speak with him."

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: There was a movement and an exclamation from my right, and

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: peering through the gloom, I saw Whitney, pale, haggard, and

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: unkempt, staring out at me.

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: "My God! It's Watson," said he. He was in a pitiable state of

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: reaction, with every nerve in a twitter. "I say, Watson, what

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: o'clock is it?"

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: "Nearly eleven."

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: "Of what day?"

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: "Of Friday, June 19th."

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: "Good heavens! I thought it was Wednesday. It is Wednesday. What

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: d'you want to frighten a chap for?" He sank his face onto his

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: arms and began to sob in a high treble key.

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: "I tell you that it is Friday, man. Your wife has been waiting

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: this two days for you. You should be ashamed of yourself!"

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: "So I am. But you've got mixed, Watson, for I have only been here

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: a few hours, three pipes, four pipes--I forget how many. But I'll

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: go home with you. I wouldn't frighten Kate--poor little Kate.

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: Give me your hand! Have you a cab?"

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: "Yes, I have one waiting."

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: "Then I shall go in it. But I must owe something. Find what I

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: owe, Watson. I am all off colour. I can do nothing for myself."

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: I walked down the narrow passage between the double row of

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: sleepers, holding my breath to keep out the vile, stupefying

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: fumes of the drug, and looking about for the manager. As I passed

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: the tall man who sat by the brazier I felt a sudden pluck at my

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: skirt, and a low voice whispered, "Walk past me, and then look

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: back at me." The words fell quite distinctly upon my ear. I

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: glanced down. They could only have come from the old man at my

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: side, and yet he sat now as absorbed as ever, very thin, very

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: wrinkled, bent with age, an opium pipe dangling down from between

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: his knees, as though it had dropped in sheer lassitude from his

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: fingers. I took two steps forward and looked back. It took all my

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: self-control to prevent me from breaking out into a cry of

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: astonishment. He had turned his back so that none could see him

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: but I. His form had filled out, his wrinkles were gone, the dull

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: eyes had regained their fire, and there, sitting by the fire and

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: grinning at my surprise, was none other than Sherlock Holmes. He

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: made a slight motion to me to approach him, and instantly, as he

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: turned his face half round to the company once more, subsided

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: into a doddering, loose-lipped senility.

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: "Holmes!" I whispered, "what on earth are you doing in this den?"

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: "As low as you can," he answered; "I have excellent ears. If you

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: would have the great kindness to get rid of that sottish friend

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: of yours I should be exceedingly glad to have a little talk with

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: you."

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: "I have a cab outside."

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: "Then pray send him home in it. You may safely trust him, for he

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: appears to be too limp to get into any mischief. I should

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: recommend you also to send a note by the cabman to your wife to

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: say that you have thrown in your lot with me. If you will wait

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: outside, I shall be with you in five minutes."

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: It was difficult to refuse any of Sherlock Holmes' requests, for

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: they were always so exceedingly definite, and put forward with

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: such a quiet air of mastery. I felt, however, that when Whitney

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: was once confined in the cab my mission was practically

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: accomplished; and for the rest, I could not wish anything better

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: than to be associated with my friend in one of those singular

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: adventures which were the normal condition of his existence. In a

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: few minutes I had written my note, paid Whitney's bill, led him

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: out to the cab, and seen him driven through the darkness. In a

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: very short time a decrepit figure had emerged from the opium den,

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: and I was walking down the street with Sherlock Holmes. For two

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: streets he shuffled along with a bent back and an uncertain foot.

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: Then, glancing quickly round, he straightened himself out and

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: burst into a hearty fit of laughter.

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: "I suppose, Watson," said he, "that you imagine that I have added

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: opium-smoking to cocaine injections, and all the other little

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: weaknesses on which you have favoured me with your medical

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: views."

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: "I was certainly surprised to find you there."

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: "But not more so than I to find you."

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: "I came to find a friend."

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: "And I to find an enemy."

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: "An enemy?"

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: "Yes; one of my natural enemies, or, shall I say, my natural

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: prey. Briefly, Watson, I am in the midst of a very remarkable

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: inquiry, and I have hoped to find a clue in the incoherent

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: ramblings of these sots, as I have done before now. Had I been

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: recognised in that den my life would not have been worth an

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: hour's purchase; for I have used it before now for my own

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: purposes, and the rascally Lascar who runs it has sworn to have

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: vengeance upon me. There is a trap-door at the back of that

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: building, near the corner of Paul's Wharf, which could tell some

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: strange tales of what has passed through it upon the moonless

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: nights."

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: "What! You do not mean bodies?"

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: "Ay, bodies, Watson. We should be rich men if we had 1000 pounds

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: for every poor devil who has been done to death in that den. It

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: is the vilest murder-trap on the whole riverside, and I fear that

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: Neville St. Clair has entered it never to leave it more. But our

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: trap should be here." He put his two forefingers between his

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: teeth and whistled shrilly--a signal which was answered by a

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: similar whistle from the distance, followed shortly by the rattle

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: of wheels and the clink of horses' hoofs.

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: "Now, Watson," said Holmes, as a tall dog-cart dashed up through

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: the gloom, throwing out two golden tunnels of yellow light from

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: its side lanterns. "You'll come with me, won't you?"

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: "If I can be of use."

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: "Oh, a trusty comrade is always of use; and a chronicler still

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: more so. My room at The Cedars is a double-bedded one."

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: "The Cedars?"

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: "Yes; that is Mr. St. Clair's house. I am staying there while I

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: conduct the inquiry."

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: "Where is it, then?"

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: "Near Lee, in Kent. We have a seven-mile drive before us."

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: "But I am all in the dark."

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: "Of course you are. You'll know all about it presently. Jump up

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: here. All right, John; we shall not need you. Here's half a

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: crown. Look out for me to-morrow, about eleven. Give her her

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: head. So long, then!"

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: He flicked the horse with his whip, and we dashed away through

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: the endless succession of sombre and deserted streets, which

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: widened gradually, until we were flying across a broad

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: balustraded bridge, with the murky river flowing sluggishly

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: beneath us. Beyond lay another dull wilderness of bricks and

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: mortar, its silence broken only by the heavy, regular footfall of

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: the policeman, or the songs and shouts of some belated party of

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: revellers. A dull wrack was drifting slowly across the sky, and a

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: star or two twinkled dimly here and there through the rifts of

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: the clouds. Holmes drove in silence, with his head sunk upon his

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: breast, and the air of a man who is lost in thought, while I sat

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: beside him, curious to learn what this new quest might be which

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: seemed to tax his powers so sorely, and yet afraid to break in

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: upon the current of his thoughts. We had driven several miles,

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: and were beginning to get to the fringe of the belt of suburban

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: villas, when he shook himself, shrugged his shoulders, and lit up

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: his pipe with the air of a man who has satisfied himself that he

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: is acting for the best.

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: "You have a grand gift of silence, Watson," said he. "It makes

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: you quite invaluable as a companion. 'Pon my word, it is a great

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: thing for me to have someone to talk to, for my own thoughts are

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: not over-pleasant. I was wondering what I should say to this dear

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: little woman to-night when she meets me at the door."

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: "You forget that I know nothing about it."

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: "I shall just have time to tell you the facts of the case before

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: we get to Lee. It seems absurdly simple, and yet, somehow I can

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: get nothing to go upon. There's plenty of thread, no doubt, but I

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: can't get the end of it into my hand. Now, I'll state the case

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: clearly and concisely to you, Watson, and maybe you can see a

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: spark where all is dark to me."

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: "Proceed, then."

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: NA

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: "Some years ago--to be definite, in May, 1884--there came to Lee

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: a gentleman, Neville St. Clair by name, who appeared to have

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: plenty of money. He took a large villa, laid out the grounds very

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: nicely, and lived generally in good style. By degrees he made

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: friends in the neighbourhood, and in 1887 he married the daughter

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: of a local brewer, by whom he now has two children. He had no

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: occupation, but was interested in several companies and went into

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: town as a rule in the morning, returning by the 5:14 from Cannon

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: Street every night. Mr. St. Clair is now thirty-seven years of

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: age, is a man of temperate habits, a good husband, a very

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: affectionate father, and a man who is popular with all who know

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: him. I may add that his whole debts at the present moment, as far

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: as we have been able to ascertain, amount to 88 pounds 10s., while

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: "Last Monday Mr. Neville St. Clair went into town rather earlier

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: than usual, remarking before he started that he had two important

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: commissions to perform, and that he would bring his little boy

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: home a box of bricks. Now, by the merest chance, his wife

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: offices of the Aberdeen Shipping Company. Now, if you are well up

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: in your London, you will know that the office of the company is

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: Swandam Lane on her way back to the station. Have you followed me

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
text: so far?"

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP

text: "And now as to the villains who seemed to be immediately

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP

text: "So much for the Lascar manager. Now for the sinister cripple who

text: is familiar to every man who goes much to the City. He is a

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP

text: regulations he pretends to a small trade in wax vestas. Some

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP

story: ADVENTURE VI. THE MAN WITH THE TWISTED LIP
