story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "'I say a night's work, but an hour's would be nearer the mark. I

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: simply want your opinion about a hydraulic stamping machine which

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: has got out of gear. If you show us what is wrong we shall soon

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: set it right ourselves. What do you think of such a commission as

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: that?'

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "'The work appears to be light and the pay munificent.'

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "'Precisely so. We shall want you to come to-night by the last

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: train.'

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "'Where to?'

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "'To Eyford, in Berkshire. It is a little place near the borders

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: of Oxfordshire, and within seven miles of Reading. There is a

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: train from Paddington which would bring you there at about

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "'Very good.'

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "'I shall come down in a carriage to meet you.'

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "'There is a drive, then?'

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "'Yes, our little place is quite out in the country. It is a good

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: seven miles from Eyford Station.'

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "'Then we can hardly get there before midnight. I suppose there

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: would be no chance of a train back. I should be compelled to stop

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: the night.'

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "'Yes, we could easily give you a shake-down.'

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "'That is very awkward. Could I not come at some more convenient

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: hour?'

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "'We have judged it best that you should come late. It is to

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: recompense you for any inconvenience that we are paying to you, a

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: young and unknown man, a fee which would buy an opinion from the

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: very heads of your profession. Still, of course, if you would

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: like to draw out of the business, there is plenty of time to do

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: so.'

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "I thought of the fifty guineas, and of how very useful they

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: would be to me. 'Not at all,' said I, 'I shall be very happy to

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: accommodate myself to your wishes. I should like, however, to

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: understand a little more clearly what it is that you wish me to

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: do.'

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "'Quite so. It is very natural that the pledge of secrecy which

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: we have exacted from you should have aroused your curiosity. I

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: have no wish to commit you to anything without your having it all

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: laid before you. I suppose that we are absolutely safe from

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: eavesdroppers?'

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "'Entirely.'

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "'Then the matter stands thus. You are probably aware that

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: fuller's-earth is a valuable product, and that it is only found

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: in one or two places in England?'

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "'I have heard so.'

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "'Some little time ago I bought a small place--a very small

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: place--within ten miles of Reading. I was fortunate enough to

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: discover that there was a deposit of fuller's-earth in one of my

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: fields. On examining it, however, I found that this deposit was a

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: comparatively small one, and that it formed a link between two

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: very much larger ones upon the right and left--both of them,

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: however, in the grounds of my neighbours. These good people were

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: absolutely ignorant that their land contained that which was

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: quite as valuable as a gold-mine. Naturally, it was to my

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: interest to buy their land before they discovered its true value,

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: but unfortunately I had no capital by which I could do this. I

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: took a few of my friends into the secret, however, and they

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: suggested that we should quietly and secretly work our own little

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: deposit and that in this way we should earn the money which would

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: enable us to buy the neighbouring fields. This we have now been

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: doing for some time, and in order to help us in our operations we

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: erected a hydraulic press. This press, as I have already

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: explained, has got out of order, and we wish your advice upon the

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: subject. We guard our secret very jealously, however, and if it

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: once became known that we had hydraulic engineers coming to our

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: little house, it would soon rouse inquiry, and then, if the facts

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: came out, it would be good-bye to any chance of getting these

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: fields and carrying out our plans. That is why I have made you

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: promise me that you will not tell a human being that you are

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: going to Eyford to-night. I hope that I make it all plain?'

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "'I quite follow you,' said I. 'The only point which I could not

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: quite understand was what use you could make of a hydraulic press

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: in excavating fuller's-earth, which, as I understand, is dug out

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: like gravel from a pit.'

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "'Ah!' said he carelessly, 'we have our own process. We compress

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: the earth into bricks, so as to remove them without revealing

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: what they are. But that is a mere detail. I have taken you fully

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: into my confidence now, Mr. Hatherley, and I have shown you how I

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: trust you.' He rose as he spoke. 'I shall expect you, then, at

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: Eyford at 11:15.'

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "'I shall certainly be there.'

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "'And not a word to a soul.' He looked at me with a last long,

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: questioning gaze, and then, pressing my hand in a cold, dank

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: grasp, he hurried from the room.

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "Well, when I came to think it all over in cool blood I was very

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: much astonished, as you may both think, at this sudden commission

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: which had been intrusted to me. On the one hand, of course, I was

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: glad, for the fee was at least tenfold what I should have asked

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: had I set a price upon my own services, and it was possible that

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: this order might lead to other ones. On the other hand, the face

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: and manner of my patron had made an unpleasant impression upon

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: me, and I could not think that his explanation of the

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: fuller's-earth was sufficient to explain the necessity for my

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: coming at midnight, and his extreme anxiety lest I should tell

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: anyone of my errand. However, I threw all fears to the winds, ate

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: a hearty supper, drove to Paddington, and started off, having

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: obeyed to the letter the injunction as to holding my tongue.

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "At Reading I had to change not only my carriage but my station.

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: However, I was in time for the last train to Eyford, and I

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: reached the little dim-lit station after eleven o'clock. I was the

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: only passenger who got out there, and there was no one upon the

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: platform save a single sleepy porter with a lantern. As I passed

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: out through the wicket gate, however, I found my acquaintance of

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: the morning waiting in the shadow upon the other side. Without a

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: word he grasped my arm and hurried me into a carriage, the door

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: of which was standing open. He drew up the windows on either

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: side, tapped on the wood-work, and away we went as fast as the

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: horse could go."

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "One horse?" interjected Holmes.

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "Yes, only one."

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "Did you observe the colour?"

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "Yes, I saw it by the side-lights when I was stepping into the

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: carriage. It was a chestnut."

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "Tired-looking or fresh?"

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "Oh, fresh and glossy."

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "Thank you. I am sorry to have interrupted you. Pray continue

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: your most interesting statement."

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "Away we went then, and we drove for at least an hour. Colonel

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: Lysander Stark had said that it was only seven miles, but I

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: should think, from the rate that we seemed to go, and from the

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: time that we took, that it must have been nearer twelve. He sat

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: at my side in silence all the time, and I was aware, more than

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: once when I glanced in his direction, that he was looking at me

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: with great intensity. The country roads seem to be not very good

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: in that part of the world, for we lurched and jolted terribly. I

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: tried to look out of the windows to see something of where we

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: were, but they were made of frosted glass, and I could make out

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: nothing save the occasional bright blur of a passing light. Now

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: and then I hazarded some remark to break the monotony of the

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: journey, but the colonel answered only in monosyllables, and the

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: conversation soon flagged. At last, however, the bumping of the

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: road was exchanged for the crisp smoothness of a gravel-drive,

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: and the carriage came to a stand. Colonel Lysander Stark sprang

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: out, and, as I followed after him, pulled me swiftly into a porch

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: which gaped in front of us. We stepped, as it were, right out of

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: the carriage and into the hall, so that I failed to catch the

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: most fleeting glance of the front of the house. The instant that

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: I had crossed the threshold the door slammed heavily behind us,

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: and I heard faintly the rattle of the wheels as the carriage

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: drove away.

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "It was pitch dark inside the house, and the colonel fumbled

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: about looking for matches and muttering under his breath.

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: Suddenly a door opened at the other end of the passage, and a

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: long, golden bar of light shot out in our direction. It grew

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: broader, and a woman appeared with a lamp in her hand, which she

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: held above her head, pushing her face forward and peering at us.

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: I could see that she was pretty, and from the gloss with which

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: the light shone upon her dark dress I knew that it was a rich

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: material. She spoke a few words in a foreign tongue in a tone as

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: though asking a question, and when my companion answered in a

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: gruff monosyllable she gave such a start that the lamp nearly

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: fell from her hand. Colonel Stark went up to her, whispered

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: something in her ear, and then, pushing her back into the room

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: from whence she had come, he walked towards me again with the

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: lamp in his hand.

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "'Perhaps you will have the kindness to wait in this room for a

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: few minutes,' said he, throwing open another door. It was a

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: quiet, little, plainly furnished room, with a round table in the

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: centre, on which several German books were scattered. Colonel

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: Stark laid down the lamp on the top of a harmonium beside the

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: door. 'I shall not keep you waiting an instant,' said he, and

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: vanished into the darkness.

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "I glanced at the books upon the table, and in spite of my

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: ignorance of German I could see that two of them were treatises

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: on science, the others being volumes of poetry. Then I walked

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: across to the window, hoping that I might catch some glimpse of

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: the country-side, but an oak shutter, heavily barred, was folded

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: across it. It was a wonderfully silent house. There was an old

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: clock ticking loudly somewhere in the passage, but otherwise

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: everything was deadly still. A vague feeling of uneasiness began

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: to steal over me. Who were these German people, and what were

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: they doing living in this strange, out-of-the-way place? And

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: where was the place? I was ten miles or so from Eyford, that was

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: all I knew, but whether north, south, east, or west I had no

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: idea. For that matter, Reading, and possibly other large towns,

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: were within that radius, so the place might not be so secluded,

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: after all. Yet it was quite certain, from the absolute stillness,

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: that we were in the country. I paced up and down the room,

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: humming a tune under my breath to keep up my spirits and feeling

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: that I was thoroughly earning my fifty-guinea fee.

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "Suddenly, without any preliminary sound in the midst of the

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: utter stillness, the door of my room swung slowly open. The woman

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: was standing in the aperture, the darkness of the hall behind

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: her, the yellow light from my lamp beating upon her eager and

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: beautiful face. I could see at a glance that she was sick with

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: fear, and the sight sent a chill to my own heart. She held up one

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: shaking finger to warn me to be silent, and she shot a few

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: whispered words of broken English at me, her eyes glancing back,

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: like those of a frightened horse, into the gloom behind her.

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "'I would go,' said she, trying hard, as it seemed to me, to

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: speak calmly; 'I would go. I should not stay here. There is no

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: good for you to do.'

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "'But, madam,' said I, 'I have not yet done what I came for. I

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: cannot possibly leave until I have seen the machine.'

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "'It is not worth your while to wait,' she went on. 'You can pass

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: through the door; no one hinders.' And then, seeing that I smiled

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: and shook my head, she suddenly threw aside her constraint and

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: made a step forward, with her hands wrung together. 'For the love

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: of Heaven!' she whispered, 'get away from here before it is too

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: late!'

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "But I am somewhat headstrong by nature, and the more ready to

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: engage in an affair when there is some obstacle in the way. I

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: thought of my fifty-guinea fee, of my wearisome journey, and of

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: the unpleasant night which seemed to be before me. Was it all to

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: go for nothing? Why should I slink away without having carried

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: out my commission, and without the payment which was my due? This

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: woman might, for all I knew, be a monomaniac. With a stout

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: bearing, therefore, though her manner had shaken me more than I

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: cared to confess, I still shook my head and declared my intention

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: of remaining where I was. She was about to renew her entreaties

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: when a door slammed overhead, and the sound of several footsteps

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: was heard upon the stairs. She listened for an instant, threw up

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: her hands with a despairing gesture, and vanished as suddenly and

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: as noiselessly as she had come.

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "The newcomers were Colonel Lysander Stark and a short thick man

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: with a chinchilla beard growing out of the creases of his double

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: chin, who was introduced to me as Mr. Ferguson.

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "'This is my secretary and manager,' said the colonel. 'By the

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: way, I was under the impression that I left this door shut just

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: now. I fear that you have felt the draught.'

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "'On the contrary,' said I, 'I opened the door myself because I

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: felt the room to be a little close.'

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "He shot one of his suspicious looks at me. 'Perhaps we had

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: better proceed to business, then,' said he. 'Mr. Ferguson and I

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: will take you up to see the machine.'

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "'I had better put my hat on, I suppose.'

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "'Oh, no, it is in the house.'

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "'What, you dig fuller's-earth in the house?'

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "'No, no. This is only where we compress it. But never mind that.

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: All we wish you to do is to examine the machine and to let us

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: know what is wrong with it.'

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "We went upstairs together, the colonel first with the lamp, the

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: fat manager and I behind him. It was a labyrinth of an old house,

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: with corridors, passages, narrow winding staircases, and little

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: low doors, the thresholds of which were hollowed out by the

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: generations who had crossed them. There were no carpets and no

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: signs of any furniture above the ground floor, while the plaster

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: was peeling off the walls, and the damp was breaking through in

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: green, unhealthy blotches. I tried to put on as unconcerned an

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: air as possible, but I had not forgotten the warnings of the

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: lady, even though I disregarded them, and I kept a keen eye upon

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: my two companions. Ferguson appeared to be a morose and silent

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: man, but I could see from the little that he said that he was at

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: least a fellow-countryman.

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "Colonel Lysander Stark stopped at last before a low door, which

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: he unlocked. Within was a small, square room, in which the three

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: of us could hardly get at one time. Ferguson remained outside,

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: and the colonel ushered me in.

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "'We are now,' said he, 'actually within the hydraulic press, and

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: it would be a particularly unpleasant thing for us if anyone were

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: to turn it on. The ceiling of this small chamber is really the

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: end of the descending piston, and it comes down with the force of

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: many tons upon this metal floor. There are small lateral columns

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: of water outside which receive the force, and which transmit and

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: multiply it in the manner which is familiar to you. The machine

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: goes readily enough, but there is some stiffness in the working

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: of it, and it has lost a little of its force. Perhaps you will

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: have the goodness to look it over and to show us how we can set

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: it right.'

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "I took the lamp from him, and I examined the machine very

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: thoroughly. It was indeed a gigantic one, and capable of

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: exercising enormous pressure. When I passed outside, however, and

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: pressed down the levers which controlled it, I knew at once by

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: the whishing sound that there was a slight leakage, which allowed

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: a regurgitation of water through one of the side cylinders. An

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: examination showed that one of the india-rubber bands which was

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: round the head of a driving-rod had shrunk so as not quite to

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: fill the socket along which it worked. This was clearly the cause

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: of the loss of power, and I pointed it out to my companions, who

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: followed my remarks very carefully and asked several practical

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: questions as to how they should proceed to set it right. When I

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: had made it clear to them, I returned to the main chamber of the

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: machine and took a good look at it to satisfy my own curiosity.

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: It was obvious at a glance that the story of the fuller's-earth

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: was the merest fabrication, for it would be absurd to suppose

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: that so powerful an engine could be designed for so inadequate a

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: purpose. The walls were of wood, but the floor consisted of a

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: large iron trough, and when I came to examine it I could see a

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: crust of metallic deposit all over it. I had stooped and was

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: scraping at this to see exactly what it was when I heard a

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: muttered exclamation in German and saw the cadaverous face of the

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: colonel looking down at me.

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "'What are you doing there?' he asked.

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "I felt angry at having been tricked by so elaborate a story as

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: that which he had told me. 'I was admiring your fuller's-earth,'

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: said I; 'I think that I should be better able to advise you as to

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: your machine if I knew what the exact purpose was for which it

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: was used.'

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "The instant that I uttered the words I regretted the rashness of

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: my speech. His face set hard, and a baleful light sprang up in

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: his grey eyes.

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "'Very well,' said he, 'you shall know all about the machine.' He

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: took a step backward, slammed the little door, and turned the key

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: in the lock. I rushed towards it and pulled at the handle, but it

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: was quite secure, and did not give in the least to my kicks and

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: shoves. 'Hullo!' I yelled. 'Hullo! Colonel! Let me out!'

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "And then suddenly in the silence I heard a sound which sent my

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: heart into my mouth. It was the clank of the levers and the swish

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: of the leaking cylinder. He had set the engine at work. The lamp

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: still stood upon the floor where I had placed it when examining

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: the trough. By its light I saw that the black ceiling was coming

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: down upon me, slowly, jerkily, but, as none knew better than

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: myself, with a force which must within a minute grind me to a

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: shapeless pulp. I threw myself, screaming, against the door, and

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: dragged with my nails at the lock. I implored the colonel to let

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: me out, but the remorseless clanking of the levers drowned my

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: cries. The ceiling was only a foot or two above my head, and with

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: my hand upraised I could feel its hard, rough surface. Then it

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: flashed through my mind that the pain of my death would depend

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: very much upon the position in which I met it. If I lay on my

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: face the weight would come upon my spine, and I shuddered to

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: think of that dreadful snap. Easier the other way, perhaps; and

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: yet, had I the nerve to lie and look up at that deadly black

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: shadow wavering down upon me? Already I was unable to stand

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: erect, when my eye caught something which brought a gush of hope

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: back to my heart.

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "I have said that though the floor and ceiling were of iron, the

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: walls were of wood. As I gave a last hurried glance around, I saw

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: a thin line of yellow light between two of the boards, which

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: broadened and broadened as a small panel was pushed backward. For

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: an instant I could hardly believe that here was indeed a door

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: which led away from death. The next instant I threw myself

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: through, and lay half-fainting upon the other side. The panel had

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: closed again behind me, but the crash of the lamp, and a few

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: moments afterwards the clang of the two slabs of metal, told me

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: how narrow had been my escape.

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "I was recalled to myself by a frantic plucking at my wrist, and

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: I found myself lying upon the stone floor of a narrow corridor,

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: while a woman bent over me and tugged at me with her left hand,

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: while she held a candle in her right. It was the same good friend

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: whose warning I had so foolishly rejected.

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "'Come! come!' she cried breathlessly. 'They will be here in a

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: moment. They will see that you are not there. Oh, do not waste

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: the so-precious time, but come!'

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "This time, at least, I did not scorn her advice. I staggered to

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: my feet and ran with her along the corridor and down a winding

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: stair. The latter led to another broad passage, and just as we

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: reached it we heard the sound of running feet and the shouting of

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: two voices, one answering the other from the floor on which  we

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: were and from the one beneath. My guide stopped and looked about

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: her like one  who is at her wit's end. Then she threw open a door

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: which led into a bedroom, through the window of which the moon

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: was shining brightly.

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "'It is your only chance,' said she. 'It is high, but it may be

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: that you can jump it.'

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "As she spoke a light sprang into view at the further end of the

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: passage, and I saw the lean figure of Colonel Lysander Stark

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: rushing forward with a lantern in one hand and a weapon like a

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: butcher's cleaver in the other. I rushed across the bedroom,

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: flung open the window, and looked out. How quiet and sweet and

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: wholesome the garden looked in the moonlight, and it could not be

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: more than thirty feet down. I clambered out upon the sill, but I

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: hesitated to jump until I should have heard what passed between

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: my saviour and the ruffian who pursued me. If she were ill-used,

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: then at any risks I was determined to go back to her assistance.

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: The thought had hardly flashed through my mind before he was at

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: the door, pushing his way past her; but she threw her arms round

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: him and tried to hold him back.

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "'Fritz! Fritz!' she cried in English, 'remember your promise

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: after the last time. You said it should not be again. He will be

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: silent! Oh, he will be silent!'

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "'You are mad, Elise!' he shouted, struggling to break away from

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: her. 'You will be the ruin of us. He has seen too much. Let me

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: pass, I say!' He dashed her to one side, and, rushing to the

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: window, cut at me with his heavy weapon. I had let myself go, and

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: was hanging by the hands to the sill, when his blow fell. I was

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: conscious of a dull pain, my grip loosened, and I fell into the

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: garden below.

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "I was shaken but not hurt by the fall; so I picked myself up and

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: rushed off among the bushes as hard as I could run, for I

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: understood that I was far from being out of danger yet. Suddenly,

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: however, as I ran, a deadly dizziness and sickness came over me.

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: I glanced down at my hand, which was throbbing painfully, and

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: then, for the first time, saw that my thumb had been cut off and

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: that the blood was pouring from my wound. I endeavoured to tie my

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: handkerchief round it, but there came a sudden buzzing in my

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: ears, and next moment I fell in a dead faint among the

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: rose-bushes.

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "How long I remained unconscious I cannot tell. It must have been

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: a very long time, for the moon had sunk, and a bright morning was

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: breaking when I came to myself. My clothes were all sodden with

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: dew, and my coat-sleeve was drenched with blood from my wounded

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: thumb. The smarting of it recalled in an instant all the

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: particulars of my night's adventure, and I sprang to my feet with

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: the feeling that I might hardly yet be safe from my pursuers. But

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: to my astonishment, when I came to look round me, neither house

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: nor garden were to be seen. I had been lying in an angle of the

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: hedge close by the highroad, and just a little lower down was a

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: long building, which proved, upon my approaching it, to be the

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: very station at which I had arrived upon the previous night. Were

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: it not for the ugly wound upon my hand, all that had passed

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: during those dreadful hours might have been an evil dream.

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "Half dazed, I went into the station and asked about the morning

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: train. There would be one to Reading in less than an hour. The

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: same porter was on duty, I found, as had been there when I

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: arrived. I inquired of him whether he had ever heard of Colonel

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: Lysander Stark. The name was strange to him. Had he observed a

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: carriage the night before waiting for me? No, he had not. Was

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: there a police-station anywhere near? There was one about three

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: miles off.

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "It was too far for me to go, weak and ill as I was. I determined

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: to wait until I got back to town before telling my story to the

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: police. It was a little past six when I arrived, so I went first

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: to have my wound dressed, and then the doctor was kind enough to

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: bring me along here. I put the case into your hands and shall do

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: exactly what you advise."

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: We both sat in silence for some little time after listening to

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: this extraordinary narrative. Then Sherlock Holmes pulled down

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: from the shelf one of the ponderous commonplace books in which he

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: placed his cuttings.

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "Here is an advertisement which will interest you," said he. "It

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: appeared in all the papers about a year ago. Listen to this:

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: 'Lost, on the 9th inst., Mr. Jeremiah Hayling, aged

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: twenty-six, a hydraulic engineer. Left his lodgings at ten

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: o'clock at night, and has not been heard of since. Was

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: dressed in,' etc., etc. Ha! That represents the last time that

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: the colonel needed to have his machine overhauled, I fancy."

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "Good heavens!" cried my patient. "Then that explains what the

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: girl said."

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "Undoubtedly. It is quite clear that the colonel was a cool and

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: desperate man, who was absolutely determined that nothing should

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: stand in the way of his little game, like those out-and-out

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: pirates who will leave no survivor from a captured ship. Well,

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: every moment now is precious, so if you feel equal to it we shall

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: go down to Scotland Yard at once as a preliminary to starting for

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: Eyford."

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: Some three hours or so afterwards we were all in the train

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: together, bound from Reading to the little Berkshire village.

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: There were Sherlock Holmes, the hydraulic engineer, Inspector

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: Bradstreet, of Scotland Yard, a plain-clothes man, and myself.

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: Bradstreet had spread an ordnance map of the county out upon the

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: seat and was busy with his compasses drawing a circle with Eyford

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: for its centre.

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "There you are," said he. "That circle is drawn at a radius of

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: ten miles from the village. The place we want must be somewhere

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: near that line. You said ten miles, I think, sir."

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "It was an hour's good drive."

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "And you think that they brought you back all that way when you

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: were unconscious?"

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "They must have done so. I have a confused memory, too, of having

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: been lifted and conveyed somewhere."

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "What I cannot understand," said I, "is why they should have

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: spared you when they found you lying fainting in the garden.

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: Perhaps the villain was softened by the woman's entreaties."

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "I hardly think that likely. I never saw a more inexorable face

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: in my life."

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "Oh, we shall soon clear up all that," said Bradstreet. "Well, I

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: have drawn my circle, and I only wish I knew at what point upon

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: it the folk that we are in search of are to be found."

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "I think I could lay my finger on it," said Holmes quietly.

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "Really, now!" cried the inspector, "you have formed your

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: opinion! Come, now, we shall see who agrees with you. I say it is

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: south, for the country is more deserted there."

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "And I say east," said my patient.

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "I am for west," remarked the plain-clothes man. "There are

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: several quiet little villages up there."

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "And I am for north," said I, "because there are no hills there,

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: and our friend says that he did not notice the carriage go up

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: any."

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "Come," cried the inspector, laughing; "it's a very pretty

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: diversity of opinion. We have boxed the compass among us. Who do

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: you give your casting vote to?"

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "You are all wrong."

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "But we can't all be."

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "Oh, yes, you can. This is my point." He placed his finger in the

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: centre of the circle. "This is where we shall find them."

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "But the twelve-mile drive?" gasped Hatherley.

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "Six out and six back. Nothing simpler. You say yourself that the

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: horse was fresh and glossy when you got in. How could it be that

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: if it had gone twelve miles over heavy roads?"

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "Indeed, it is a likely ruse enough," observed Bradstreet

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: thoughtfully. "Of course there can be no doubt as to the nature

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: of this gang."

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "None at all," said Holmes. "They are coiners on a large scale,

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: and have used the machine to form the amalgam which has taken the

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: place of silver."

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "We have known for some time that a clever gang was at work,"

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: said the inspector. "They have been turning out half-crowns by

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: the thousand. We even traced them as far as Reading, but could

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: get no farther, for they had covered their traces in a way that

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: showed that they were very old hands. But now, thanks to this

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: lucky chance, I think that we have got them right enough."

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: But the inspector was mistaken, for those criminals were not

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: destined to fall into the hands of justice. As we rolled into

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: Eyford Station we saw a gigantic column of smoke which streamed

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: up from behind a small clump of trees in the neighbourhood and

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: hung like an immense ostrich feather over the landscape.

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "A house on fire?" asked Bradstreet as the train steamed off

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: again on its way.

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "Yes, sir!" said the station-master.

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "When did it break out?"

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "I hear that it was during the night, sir, but it has got worse,

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: and the whole place is in a blaze."

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "Whose house is it?"

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "Dr. Becher's."

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "Tell me," broke in the engineer, "is Dr. Becher a German, very

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: thin, with a long, sharp nose?"

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: The station-master laughed heartily. "No, sir, Dr. Becher is an

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: Englishman, and there isn't a man in the parish who has a

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: better-lined waistcoat. But he has a gentleman staying with him,

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: a patient, as I understand, who is a foreigner, and he looks as

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: if a little good Berkshire beef would do him no harm."

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: The station-master had not finished his speech before we were all

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: hastening in the direction of the fire. The road topped a low

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: hill, and there was a great widespread whitewashed building in

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: front of us, spouting fire at every chink and window, while in

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: the garden in front three fire-engines were vainly striving to

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: keep the flames under.

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "That's it!" cried Hatherley, in intense excitement. "There is

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: the gravel-drive, and there are the rose-bushes where I lay. That

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: second window is the one that I jumped from."

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "Well, at least," said Holmes, "you have had your revenge upon

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: them. There can be no question that it was your oil-lamp which,

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: when it was crushed in the press, set fire to the wooden walls,

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: though no doubt they were too excited in the chase after you to

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: observe it at the time. Now keep your eyes open in this crowd for

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: your friends of last night, though I very much fear that they are

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: a good hundred miles off by now."

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: And Holmes' fears came to be realised, for from that day to this

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: no word has ever been heard either of the beautiful woman, the

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: sinister German, or the morose Englishman. Early that morning a

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: peasant had met a cart containing several people and some very

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: bulky boxes driving rapidly in the direction of Reading, but

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: there all traces of the fugitives disappeared, and even Holmes'

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: ingenuity failed ever to discover the least clue as to their

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: whereabouts.

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: The firemen had been much perturbed at the strange arrangements

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: which they had found within, and still more so by discovering a

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: newly severed human thumb upon a window-sill of the second floor.

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: About sunset, however, their efforts were at last successful, and

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: they subdued the flames, but not before the roof had fallen in,

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: and the whole place been reduced to such absolute ruin that, save

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: some twisted cylinders and iron piping, not a trace remained of

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: the machinery which had cost our unfortunate acquaintance so

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: dearly. Large masses of nickel and of tin were discovered stored

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: in an out-house, but no coins were to be found, which may have

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: explained the presence of those bulky boxes which have been

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: already referred to.

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: How our hydraulic engineer had been conveyed from the garden to

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: the spot where he recovered his senses might have remained

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: forever a mystery were it not for the soft mould, which told us a

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: very plain tale. He had evidently been carried down by two

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: persons, one of whom had remarkably small feet and the other

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: unusually large ones. On the whole, it was most probable that the

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: silent Englishman, being less bold or less murderous than his

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: companion, had assisted the woman to bear the unconscious man out

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: of the way of danger.

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "Well," said our engineer ruefully as we took our seats to return

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: once more to London, "it has been a pretty business for me! I

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: have lost my thumb and I have lost a fifty-guinea fee, and what

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: have I gained?"

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: "Experience," said Holmes, laughing. "Indirectly it may be of

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: value, you know; you have only to put it into words to gain the

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: reputation of being excellent company for the remainder of your

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: existence."

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER'S THUMB
text: NA

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: NA

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: The Lord St. Simon marriage, and its curious termination, have

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: long ceased to be a subject of interest in those exalted circles

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: in which the unfortunate bridegroom moves. Fresh scandals have

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: eclipsed it, and their more piquant details have drawn the

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: gossips away from this four-year-old drama. As I have reason to

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: believe, however, that the full facts have never been revealed to

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: the general public, and as my friend Sherlock Holmes had a

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: considerable share in clearing the matter up, I feel that no

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: memoir of him would be complete without some little sketch of

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: this remarkable episode.

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: NA

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: It was a few weeks before my own marriage, during the days when I

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: was still sharing rooms with Holmes in Baker Street, that he came

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: home from an afternoon stroll to find a letter on the table

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: waiting for him. I had remained indoors all day, for the weather

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: had taken a sudden turn to rain, with high autumnal winds, and

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: the Jezail bullet which I had brought back in one of my limbs as

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: a relic of my Afghan campaign throbbed with dull persistence.

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: With my body in one easy-chair and my legs upon another, I had

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: surrounded myself with a cloud of newspapers until at last,

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: saturated with the news of the day, I tossed them all aside and

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: lay listless, watching the huge crest and monogram upon the

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: envelope upon the table and wondering lazily who my friend's

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: noble correspondent could be.

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: NA

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: "Here is a very fashionable epistle," I remarked as he entered.

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: "Your morning letters, if I remember right, were from a

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: fish-monger and a tide-waiter."

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: "'MY DEAR MR. SHERLOCK HOLMES:--Lord Backwater tells me that I

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: may place implicit reliance upon your judgment and discretion. I

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: have determined, therefore, to call upon you and to consult you

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: in reference to the very painful event which has occurred in

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: connection with my wedding. Mr. Lestrade, of Scotland Yard, is

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: acting already in the matter, but he assures me that he sees no

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: objection to your co-operation, and that he even thinks that

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: it might be of some assistance. I will call at four o'clock in

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: the afternoon, and, should you have any other engagement at that

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: time, I hope that you will postpone it, as this matter is of

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: paramount importance. Yours faithfully, ST. SIMON.'

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: as he folded up the epistle.

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: hour."

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: the subject. Turn over those papers and arrange the extracts in

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: their order of time, while I take a glance as to who our client

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: reference beside the mantelpiece. "Here he is," said he, sitting

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: down and flattening it out upon his knee. "'Lord Robert Walsingham

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: Azure, three caltrops in chief over a fess sable. Born in 1846.'

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: He's forty-one years of age, which is mature for marriage. Was

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: Under-Secretary for the colonies in a late administration. The

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: Duke, his father, was at one time Secretary for Foreign Affairs.

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: They inherit Plantagenet blood by direct descent, and Tudor on

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: the distaff side. Ha! Well, there is nothing very instructive in

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: all this. I think that I must turn to you Watson, for something

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: "I have very little difficulty in finding what I want," said I,

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR

text: "Here is the first notice which I can find. It is in the personal

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR

text: "There was a paragraph amplifying this in one of the society

text: call for protection in the marriage market, for the present

text: free-trade principle appears to tell heavily against our home

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: product. One by one the management of the noble houses of Great

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: Britain is passing into the hands of our fair cousins from across

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: the Atlantic. An important addition has been made during the last

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: week to the list of the prizes which have been borne away by

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: these charming invaders. Lord St. Simon, who has shown himself

text: for over twenty years proof against the little god's arrows, has

text: now definitely announced his approaching marriage with Miss Hatty

text: Doran, the fascinating daughter of a California millionaire. Miss

text: Doran, whose graceful figure and striking face attracted much

text: attention at the Westbury House festivities, is an only child,

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: and it is currently reported that her dowry will run to

text: is not the only gainer by an alliance which will enable her to

text: make the easy and common transition from a Republican lady to a

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR

text: "Anything else?" asked Holmes, yawning.

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: "Oh, yes; plenty. Then there is another note in the Morning Post

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: to say that the marriage would be an absolutely quiet one, that it

text: return to the furnished house at Lancaster Gate which has been

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: NA

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: "Indeed. This is more interesting than it promised to be; quite

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: dramatic, in fact."

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: NA

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: "Yes; it struck me as being a little out of the common."

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: NA

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: "They often vanish before the ceremony, and occasionally during

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: the honeymoon; but I cannot call to mind anything quite so prompt

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR

story: X. THE ADVENTURE OF THE NOBLE BACHELOR
text: NA
